msg: HCATALOG-598 fix setting hcatalog version number via the command-line

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-7620] Disables load balancer during the batchedUpload test
The testBatchedUploadWithRegionMoves might fail sometimes if the load
balancer kicks-in during the endBatchedUpload() call. During this call
while fetching the flush times of the regions on the regionservers, if
the region location changes, it throws an exception.
It might be good to make the endBatchedUpload() handle benign region
movements caused by load balancer. If the region has moved, then we can
verify the flush times from the new location. I will file a separate
task for this change. In the mean while, in order to make the test case
pass, I am disabling the load balancer during the write period.
Exexute the TestBatchedUpload test, it should pass and also
run the MR Unit Test Suite

author: liyin
msg: [89-fb] [HBASE-7509] Initialize the number of threads for quorum reads after initializing fs
It looks like quorum reads are disabled on start up; irrespective of the
setting because the call was made before initializing the file system.
Ensure the correct order, so the configuration setting is respected.
deploy to dev cluster and restart. Ensure that quorum reads
